<h1 align="center">
  Music App
</h1>

> A simple music player for local audio files built with gatsbyjs, redux, react

![Build and Deploy](https://github.com/james-muriithi/music-app/workflows/Build%20and%20Deploy/badge.svg?branch=master)
[![js-standard-style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-standard-brightgreen.svg)](http://standardjs.com/)

[CHECK OUT THE DEMO](https://music-app123.firebaseapp.com/)

## Quick start

> How to install

```
$ git clone https://github.com/james-muriithi/music-app.git
$ npm install
$ npm start
```

> Then in your browser go to [http://localhost:8000/](http://localhost:8000/)

### TECH STACK

- Gatsby
- Redux
- React

## Features

1. Play/Pause
1. Repeat Options
1. Progress Bar
1. Keyborad Controls
